data.title: Hopewell Township Washington County Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Hopewell Township Washington County Pennsylvania is one of five townships in PA named Hopewell. One of the first townships formed in Washington County PA.
data.text:
The Township Office is open Monday through Thursday, 9:00 am to 3:00 pm.

CLOSED on Fridays and Scheduled Meeting Days.

Hopewell Township, Washington County will hold their Regular Meetings in the year 2024 on the second Monday of each month at 7:00 p.m. with the exception of January, July, October and November, whereas the January meeting was advertised and held immediately following the Township Reorganization Meeting on January 02, 2024, the July 2024 regular meeting will be held on July 22, 2024 at 7:00 p.m., the October 2024 regular meeting will be held on

October 21, 2024 at 7:00 p.m. and the November 2024 regular meeting will be held on November 21, 2024 at 7:00 p.m.

The Township Planning Commission Meetings will be held on the second Monday of each month at 6:00 p.m. as needed.

Budget Workshop Meetings will be held on Monday, October 21, 2024 at 6:00 p.m. and Monday, November 18, 2024 at 6:30 p.m.

All meetings will be held at the Hopewell Township Municipal Building, 20 Parkview Road, Avella, PA 15312.

The Township Office will be closed on all Public Holidays observed by the Federal Government and Good Friday, Primary Election Day, General Election Day, the Day after Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve and New Yearâ€™s Eve.

The annual Township Reorganization Meeting is held the first Monday of the year at 6:30 p.m. (unless the first Monday falls on a Holiday whereas the meeting will be held on the first Tuesday of the year.) The January Board of Supervisors Meeting is held yearly immediately following the Annual Reorganization Meeting.
